title: Navigate forwards to a collapsed disclosure button
instructions: With focus on the 'Navigate forwards from here' link, navigate to the 'About' disclosure button.

title: Navigate backwards to a collapsed disclosure button
instructions: With focus on the 'Navigate backwards from here' link, navigate to the 'Academics' disclosure button.

title: Navigate forwards to an expanded disclosure button
instructions: With focus on the 'Navigate forwards from here' link, navigate to the 'About' disclosure button.

title: Navigate backwards to an expanded disclosure button
instructions: With focus on the 'Navigate backwards from here' link, navigate to the 'Academics' disclosure button.

title: Request information about a collapsed disclosure button
instructions: With focus on the 'About' disclosure button, read information about the disclosure button.

title: Request information about an expanded disclosure button
instructions: With focus on the 'About' disclosure button, read information about the disclosure button.

title: Operate a collapsed disclosure button
instructions: With focus on the 'About' disclosure button, change its state to 'expanded'.

title: Operate an expanded disclosure button
instructions: With focus on the 'About' disclosure button, change its state to 'collapsed'.

title: Navigate from an expanded disclosure button to a link in the associated dropdown
instructions: With focus on the 'About' disclosure button, navigate to the 'Overview' link.

title: Navigate from an expanded disclosure button to the current page link
instructions: With focus on the 'About' disclosure button, navigate to the 'Overview' link.

title: Navigate to an expanded disclosure button from a link in the associated dropdown
instructions: With focus on the 'Overview' link, navigate to the 'About' disclosure button.

title: Navigate from a collapsed disclosure button to a link in a dropdown
instructions: With focus on the 'Admissions' disclosure button, navigate to the 'Campus Tours' link.

title: Navigate to a collapsed disclosure button from the last link in a dropdown
instructions: With focus on the 'Campus Tours' link, navigate to the 'Admissions' disclosure button.

title: Dismiss a dropdown
instructions: With focus on the 'Overview' link, close the dropdown.

title: Activate a link in a dropdown
instructions: With focus on the 'Overview' link, activate the link.
